WindowsManagementHostInstanceId.Description: The instance ID of Windows management host.

ManagedAdAdminUsername.Description: Username of the AWS managed AD admin. For example,"<managed-directory-NetBIOS-name>\Admin"

ManagedAdAdminPassword.Description: Password of the AWS managed AD admin.

ManagedAdUsersOU.Description: OU of the AWS managed AD users.

UserGroupsToSync.Description: User Groups to sync to the AWS managed AD separated by commas. If no groups are specified, all the users will be synced.

SenderEmail.Description: Email address for sending temporary password to AD users.

BootstrapVersion.Description: Version of the CDK Bootstrap resources in this environment, automatically retrieved from SSM Parameter Store. [cdk:skip]

Assertions.AssertDescription: CDK bootstrap stack version 6 required. Please run 'cdk bootstrap' with a recent version of the CDK CLI.
